FEATUREPAGECATEGORY_SEARCH_WHERE.Statement: WHERE w2_FeaturePageCategory.shop_id = @shop_id AND ( 1 = 1 <@@hasval:category_id@@> AND w2_FeaturePageCategory.category_id LIKE CONCAT('%', @category_id, '%') -- カテゴリID </@@hasval:category_id@@> <@@hasval:category_name@@> AND w2_FeaturePageCategory.category_name = @category_name -- カテゴリ名 </@@hasval:category_name@@> <@@hasval:valid_flg@@> AND (@valid_flg = '' OR w2_FeaturePageCategory.valid_flg = @valid_flg) -- 有効フラグ </@@hasval:valid_flg@@> )

FEATUREPAGECATEGORY_SEARCH_ORDER_BY.Statement: ORDER BY w2_FeaturePageCategory.shop_id ASC, w2_FeaturePageCategory.category_id ASC
